mapper.insert: insert into employee(name, id, passwd, birth, email, phonenum, deptno, approval, level) values(#{name},#{id},#{passwd},#{birth},#{email},#{phonenum},#{deptno},#{approval},#{level})
mapper.select: select id from employee where id = #{id}
select * from employee natural join dept where empno = #{empno}
select id from employee where name = #{name} and email = #{email}
select passwd from employee where id = #{id} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update employee set passwd = #{passwd} where id = #{id}
